summary: Hearthfire stewards don\\\'t furnish cellars so I made this batch file.  It puts in player inventory all items required to completely furnish the Hearthfire basement.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Hearthfire Cellar Furnishing Materials[/b]

Hearthfire stewards will not furnish cellars so I made this batch file.  It puts in player inventory all items required to completely furnish the Hearthfire basement.

[b]Instructions[/b]: Unzip in skyrim folder, run [code]bat \"cellarstuff.txt\"[/code] in console

It is fully commented and broken out to three sections: furnishing, coffin (vampire) and shrine, so you can remove sections you might not want.

tested with Skyrim version 1.9.32.0.8 (Hearthfire, Dawnguard, Dragonborn)
 
[url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Cellar#Main_Hall:_Cellar]Cellar details[/url]
 
[url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Console#Using_Batch_Files_With_the_bat_Command]Batch file help[/url]
author: EZ Nihm
